attributes.review: Did you ever hear the tragedy of Darth Plagueis The Wise? I thought not. It’s not a story the Jedi would tell you. It’s a Sith legend. Darth Plagueis was a Dark Lord of the Sith, so powerful and so wise he could use the Force to influence the midichlorians to create life… He had such a knowledge of the dark side that he could even keep the ones he cared about from dying. The dark side of the Force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural. He became so powerful… the only thing he was afraid of was losing his power, which eventually, of course, he did. Unfortunately, he taught his apprentice everything he knew, then his apprentice killed him in his sleep. Ironic. He could save others from death, but not himself.
attributes.title: ✨🧚🏻‍♀️💕ZERO STARS💕🧚🏻‍♀️✨

attributes.review: I wish I could give this app less than 1 Star it doesn’t deserve it. I got this app to see what exactly it was. First off this app is absolutely horrible. I opened it up to see a picture of an orange with a wig saying “keep America great.” The amount of dishonesty is disgusting. The orange is acting like America is great right now or ever was. Also, the amount of pictures with this fat orange is absolutely terrifying and disgusting. The app has awful campaigning skills. In the end this app is utterly useless. You could have all the “features” on this app on a website. Also, no one wants to receive messages from a creepy older dude. Speaking that the president has 43 r@p3 allegations. Utterly horrible. This app is horrible
attributes.title: DISGUSTING ORANGE PUFF CHEETO DUDE 🤮🤮🤮

attributes.review: I decided to add this app because the one and mighty Cheeto puff made it, so I took a nap after and had this weird dream, I woke up and found the big Cheeto puff🟠staring at me! I was scared he was just staring right into my Soul and then my pet dinosaur🦖 woke up and started melting and my pet rock   just disappeared into atoms, I ran to my kitchen to find a weapon🔪 then I find the big Cheeto puff🟠 getting a tan! My eyes  👁👄👁exploded out of my eye sockets I quickly crawled to my room to delete the app I took my eyes 👁👄👁and putt them back in and he suddenly disappeared 👻 I now go to a therapist and still can’t get over the trauma😔, this is a warning⚠️ please do not get this app you will cry😭 blood🩸 instead of tears just like me.
attributes.title: The big Cheeto puff himself

attributes.review: So I get this app, right? And I see the worst Cheeto man that people call president. I’m sorry but him bright orange self made my sister have an epileptic seizure and she is now in a coma. From this awful app about taking my sisters life I’m going to warn everyone not to get this app. He looks awful and not to mention the Idek what to call it Cheeto having self is a racist, homophobic, sexist rapist that needs to rot in hell. Thanks for trying Donald trump but if u try to take our app we gon take yours. Also this is a story my friend told me about. She opened the app had explosive diarrhea, it took her chicken nuggets and threw them, made her room a mess, slapped her, and also killed her. So now she’s dead from this app.
attributes.title: Please get this off my App Store. 🤩❤️

attributes.review: I actually checked out the app in its entirety, and it’s so bad. Very biased, and filled with angry biased men that I swear want to marry trump himself. Other than that, I had to enter my phone number, which at the time I believed to be standard. About 10 minutes later I got a text that said “Hi I’m bored”, I ignored it. Then a minute later I received another that said “so do you like me? Or do you like like me?” I was so confused. I asked who it was and i got the reply, “DJ Trump, you just downloaded my app....so do you like me? Or do you like like me?”. I’ve never been put so on the spot like that. How do I say “neither” to that? I was in a predicament, then I figured out just what to say. I replied “Arrest the cops that killed Breonna Taylor”.
attributes.title: AWFUL app

attributes.review: i would first like to say this app took A WHOLE MONTH to download 😒 and i had pretty good wifi, the chinese gov cant even spy on me thats how the my wifi is,,, well when the app did download and i got to open it MAN WILL I SAy i am VERY disappointed 😩😔✨ as soon as i opened it i got startled hy a loud scream coming from my phone, now i dont know if this is whats HIP wit the kids now a days but my oh my i was given a big fright, when i finally got the screaming to stop, my phone started to overheat very badly and i got a notification from the app saying "we are going to self destruct your phone if you dont write a review",, so that is where i am now,,, i am very very scared for the cheeto populace . 😒🤷🏼‍♀️👉🏼😩✨🤣😔🤚🏼🤚🏼🥝🧸😁

Horrible it completely made my phone
 glitch so as my family and dog. So bad that we had to buy new phones even for my dog!! You don’t even know how mad my dog was that she ripped all of our clothes and it was so bad we had to sacrifice our baby brother and that didn’t work so we sacrifice our cat and she scratched him but didn’t work because he ended eating her and so we moved somewhere and we got a call that our was still there by Karen and we said how did you get and said “that didn’t matter what matter is that you still have your dog here and if you take it with you I’m have to call your Manager “ so we let our dog kill her cause she was annoying so yea end of story.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This is the worst app EVER!! It took forever to download, and not only that but the app apparently came with some sort of music that attracted a lot of bugs to my house and every now and then they would chant something about mars. But not only that but they’ve tried SEVERAL times to sacrifice my cat to the Cheeto puff of our president and chant hail satan. It was terrifying. And the bugs threatened me by saying that they’ll sacrifice me next if I didn’t vote for him. It was awful, then when I tried to delete the app it wouldn’t let me so now the app is stuck on my phone and I have to go get it repaired. This app is terrible and I have nightmares about it. The music was awful too. Anyways anyone want some Dino nuggies?
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: I don’t know about you, but I am a FAITHFUL ✝️ supporter of our beloved racist, homophobic, and sexist dictator Donald Duck, 🦆 but this app is just AWFUL😡😡 The second I opened the app I saw a pop up ad of what looked like a 🤯 pen*s 🍆 The face attached to the said 🍆 was of my beloved dictator Donald Duck 🦆 and I thought to myself “this is very unchristian of my beloved dictator!🤬😡😱😰” I immediately closed out of the ad and continued to wash out my eyes with my new Donald Duck bath water that I had recently purchased (I DO NOT RECOMMEND, THE WATER GOT ME PREGNANT 🤰) After I was finished with cleansing my eyes of the shrimp 🍤 that I saw attached to my beloved dictators body, I deleted the app. Btw I will NOT be getting an abortion because I am pro birth and because WHITE LIVES MATTER.
